sentences.sContent: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.sCn: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.sContent: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.sCn: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

sentences.sContent: instructions that are easy to follow
It would have been easy for the team to lose the game.

sentences.sContent: Having you here does make things a lot easier for me.
sentences.sCn: 对我来说，有你在这里事情的确好办多了。

sentences.sContent: The station is within easy reach of (= close to ) the town centre.
The park is within easy walking distance (= close enough to walk to ).
sentences.sCn: 公园很近，步行便可到达。
